item.title: Backend System Design
item.description: Building the backend infrastructure for our Valorant data-driven website, I encountered several unique challenges and oppurtunities to grow as a software developer. In this post, I’ll outline our current implementations and the ongoing developments for our backend system design. Pipeline with Kafka In our quest to build an advanced and reliable infrastructure, Kafka became a cornerstone of our design. The integration effectively separates our crawler from our statistical calculation components, aiming for a system that remains robust, especially when it faces potential computational challenges.
